name: Book Of The Dead
description:
Based on the Egyptian Book Of The Dead this game has you guide Ani through the ancient egyptian underworld! It was made as an entry to the World Mytholojam 2019 game jam.

Features

  • Hazards: breakable rocks, deadly lakes of fire
  • Enemies: He Who Dances In Blood, Ammit
  • Collectables: shabtis (to help you cultivate land in the afterlife)

Coming Soon

At the moment the game doesn't really have an ending but you can play to try and beat your previous score by collecting more shabtis. I plan to add an ending and make other improvements in future releases.
